title: Where are all the key fragments?
body: For about 1 week I haven't been getting anymore key fragments. My friend told me he wasn't getting anymore either. I just wanna know when I can start getting them again because I got 2 chest and 2 key frags. I really really want to open them. #IMissKeyFrags

replies.body: Since it's so close to the end of the month, there's a pretty decent chance that you've almost collected all the fragments you're allotted for the 4 week cycle. Keep in mind that you can only get [**12 key fragments every 4 weeks**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233).
